tasks.name: Multivariate Pattern Analysis with fMRI Data
tasks.definition: Investigating specific neurological markers to diagnose individuals with chronic pain using fMRI data. Analyzing contrast fMRI images in stimulation versus rest to distinguish between chronic pain and normal controls.
conditions: Painful electric stimulation applied to the lower back alternating with rest periods
contrasts: Chronic pain group vs. Normal control group based on multivariate patterns of activity in somatosensory and inferior parietal cortex
